# General =====

  * **Type:** - Matrix Processing
  * **Heading:** - Annot. rows
  * **Source code:** [ManageCategoricalAnnotRow.cs](https://github.com/JurgenCox/perseus-plugins/blob/master/PerseusPluginLib/AnnotRows/ManageCategoricalAnnotRow.cs)

# Brief description

Manage the categorical annotation rows. One important applications is to define a grouping that is 
later used in a t-test or ANOVA.

Output: Same matrix with categorical annotation rows added or modified.
